VoiceList.Entry: “Ha,Ha!…… Well, there's nothin' wrong with that,I'd say.”
“Ha! Ha!…… I wonder if my son's already left?”
“When it's just my wife and I here, you have no idea how lonesome it gets.”
“We want him to be happy and do other things while he's young, but we can't help but worry…”
“I guess we always will.”
“By the way……”
“Where are you from?”
“But if you still have a family, you outta at least write them.”
“You may leave your home,but it'll always be there for you.”
“At least that's how I see it.”
“Hmm…did you say Nibelheim? Wasn't it in the news a while back?”
“Something to do with a reactor accident…”
“That was the first major Mako accident, I remember it was all over the news.”
“This might sound rude,but…”
“Is your family still living? I forgot about them long ago I'm just an ex-SOLDIER
“Well,you really outta go home again. And if you can't do that, try and at least remember them sometimes.”
“Our boy acted like you, When he was a kid.”
“You seem to be about his age.”
“Well, would you mind leaving us alone?”
“I want to enjoy some quiet time together with my wife.”
“He used to give us nothing but headaches when he was here,but now that he's gone…we kind of miss him.”
“…Strange,isn't it?”
